trans-unit.source: Sets the cap styles for the start, end, and dashes in a line drawn with the pen

seg-source.mrk: Sets the cap styles for the start, end, and dashes in a line drawn with the pen

target.mrk: Sets the cap styles for the start, end, and dashes in a line drawn with the pen

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a Pen object

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to a Pen object

target.mrk: Pointer to a Pen object

trans-unit.source: Line cap style for the start cap:

seg-source.mrk: Line cap style for the start cap:

target.mrk: Line cap style for the start cap:

trans-unit.source: 0x00 - Line ends at the last point. The end is squared off

seg-source.mrk: 0x00 - Line ends at the last point.
The end is squared off

target.mrk: 0x00 - Line ends at the last point.
The end is squared off

trans-unit.source: 0x01 - Square cap. The center of the square is the last point in the line.

seg-source.mrk: 0x01 - Square cap.
The center of the square is the last point in the line.

target.mrk: 0x01 - Square cap.
The center of the square is the last point in the line.

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the square are the line width.

seg-source.mrk: The height and width of the square are the line width.

target.mrk: The height and width of the square are the line width.

trans-unit.source: 0x02 - Circular cap. The center of the circle is the last point in the line.

seg-source.mrk: 0x02 - Circular cap.
The center of the circle is the last point in the line.

target.mrk: 0x02 - Circular cap.
The center of the circle is the last point in the line.

trans-unit.source: The diameter of the circle is the line width.

seg-source.mrk: The diameter of the circle is the line width.

target.mrk: The diameter of the circle is the line width.

trans-unit.source: 0x03 - Triangular cap.

seg-source.mrk: 0x03 - Triangular cap.

target.mrk: 0x03 - Triangular cap.

trans-unit.source: The base of the triangle is the last point in the line.

seg-source.mrk: The base of the triangle is the last point in the line.

target.mrk: The base of the triangle is the last point in the line.

trans-unit.source: The base of the triangle is the line width.

seg-source.mrk: The base of the triangle is the line width.

target.mrk: The base of the triangle is the line width.

trans-unit.source: 0x10 - Line ends are not anchored.

seg-source.mrk: 0x10 - Line ends are not anchored.

target.mrk: 0x10 - Line ends are not anchored.

trans-unit.source: 0x11 - Line ends are anchored with a square.

seg-source.mrk: 0x11 - Line ends are anchored with a square.

target.mrk: 0x11 - Line ends are anchored with a square.

trans-unit.source: The center of the square is the last point in the line.

seg-source.mrk: The center of the square is the last point in the line.

target.mrk: The center of the square is the last point in the line.

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the square are the line width.

seg-source.mrk: The height and width of the square are the line width.

target.mrk: The height and width of the square are the line width.

trans-unit.source: 0x12 - Line ends are anchored with a circle.

seg-source.mrk: 0x12 - Line ends are anchored with a circle.

target.mrk: 0x12 - Line ends are anchored with a circle.

trans-unit.source: The center of the circle is at the last point in the line.

seg-source.mrk: The center of the circle is at the last point in the line.

target.mrk: The center of the circle is at the last point in the line.

trans-unit.source: The circle is wider than the line.

seg-source.mrk: The circle is wider than the line.

target.mrk: The circle is wider than the line.

trans-unit.source: 0x13 - Line ends are anchored with a diamond (a square turned at 45 degrees).

seg-source.mrk: 0x13 - Line ends are anchored with a diamond (a square turned at 45 degrees).

target.mrk: 0x13 - Line ends are anchored with a diamond (a square turned at 45 degrees).

trans-unit.source: The center of the diamond is at the last point in the line.

seg-source.mrk: The center of the diamond is at the last point in the line.

target.mrk: The center of the diamond is at the last point in the line.

trans-unit.source: The diamond is wider than the line.

seg-source.mrk: The diamond is wider than the line.

target.mrk: The diamond is wider than the line.

trans-unit.source: 0x14 - Line ends are anchored with arrowheads.

seg-source.mrk: 0x14 - Line ends are anchored with arrowheads.

target.mrk: 0x14 - Line ends are anchored with arrowheads.

trans-unit.source: The arrowhead point is located at the last point in the line.

seg-source.mrk: The arrowhead point is located at the last point in the line.

target.mrk: The arrowhead point is located at the last point in the line.

trans-unit.source: The arrowhead is wider than the line.

seg-source.mrk: The arrowhead is wider than the line.

target.mrk: The arrowhead is wider than the line.

trans-unit.source: 0xff - Line ends are made from a CustomLineCap object

seg-source.mrk: 0xff - Line ends are made from a CustomLineCap object

target.mrk: 0xff - Line ends are made from a CustomLineCap object

trans-unit.source: Line cap style for the end cap (same values as $iStartCap)

seg-source.mrk: Line cap style for the end cap (same values as $iStartCap)

target.mrk: Line cap style for the end cap (same values as $iStartCap)

trans-unit.source: Start and end caps for a dashed line:

seg-source.mrk: Start and end caps for a dashed line:

target.mrk: Start and end caps for a dashed line:

trans-unit.source: 0 - A square cap that squares off both ends of each dash

seg-source.mrk: 0 - A square cap that squares off both ends of each dash

target.mrk: 0 - A square cap that squares off both ends of each dash

trans-unit.source: 2 - A circular cap that rounds off both ends of each dash

seg-source.mrk: 2 - A circular cap that rounds off both ends of each dash

target.mrk: 2 - A circular cap that rounds off both ends of each dash

trans-unit.source: 3 - A triangular cap that points both ends of each dash

seg-source.mrk: 3 - A triangular cap that points both ends of each dash

target.mrk: 3 - A triangular cap that points both ends of each dash

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: True.

seg-source.mrk: True.

target.mrk: True.

trans-unit.source: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

seg-source.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).
